mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id as 'userId',a.we_chat_head_img_url as 'heardUrl', a.we_chat_nick_name as 'userName', b.user_info_grade as 'grade' FROM tb_user a JOIN tb_user_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 20
mapper.update: update tb_user_info set user_info_strength = user_info_strength - #{grade} where user_id = #{userId}
